title: Priority Design Workshop for Improving Indonesian Health e-Learning Components

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in health education
context.additional_context: Course focused on enhancing practical application competencies for adult learners in BYOD environments

learning_goals: The DUP-We methodology enables systematic analysis of weighted priorities for e-learning improvement elements
A difficulty-utility matrix for learning elements can be created based on survey data
Improvement element implementation roadmaps can be designed using pyramid visualization tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
